titles.title: Commending and congratulating Commander David W. Alldridge and the crew of the USS Newport News (SSN 750) on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the ship's commissioning.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/21/2009--Introduced. Commends and congratulates Commander David W. Alldridge and the crew of the USS Newport News on the 20th anniversary of the ship's commissioning.
